low.name: The Secret of the Crowd
low.flavor: You can hide in plain sight, so long as there are others around.
low.text: When you wear your mask and stand in a crowd, you will blend into the background unless you do something out of the ordinary to attract attention.

low.name: The Secret of the Second Skin
low.flavor: You are adept at dodging a bullet, so to speak.
low.text: Once per situation, when you are attacked by an enemy and the GM would roll to inflict stress, you take 1 stress instead.

low.name: The Secret of Loose Tongues
low.flavor: It was your job to make people say things they weren’t supposed to.
low.text: When someone takes a drink from your bottle, they will feel compelled to tell you about a crime they were involved in, or adjacent to.

low.name: Always Outnumbered, Never Outrun
low.flavor: You are exceptional at getting the hell away from your problems.
low.text: When you flee a superior force, you do so with mastery.

low.name: Assassin
low.flavor: When you get close to your target, their death is swift.
low.text: When you inflict stress in melee combat, re-roll the stress die if it shows 1. If it shows the maximum number (i.e. 6 on a D6, 8 on a D8, etc.) roll it again and add both together.

medium.name: Scapegoat
medium.flavor: Your ability to shift blame is legendary.
medium.text: Once per session, when an NPC accuses you of wrongdoing, you can automatically convince them that you’re entirely innocent and someone else (choose who) is responsible.

medium.name: Untouchable
medium.flavor: You take any measure to survive, and thus the revolution will survive.
medium.text: Once per scene, if you suffer Body fallout, mark D3 stress to Mind and transfer the fallout to a non-enemy NPC who’s in the scene instead. Whether they willingly sacrificed themselves or you managed to get behind them in time is up to you.

medium.name: Dirty Fighting
medium.flavor: You have a wide variety of dirty tricks up your sleep.
medium.text: Once per situation, when you inflict damage on an enemy, you reduce their difficulty to 0 until they get away from you and catch their breath.

medium.name: Skeleton Key
medium.flavor: No lock will impede your progress.
medium.text: When you try to open a door, that door is unlocked and unbarred. It works on windows and trapdoors, but not on safes or display cases — it only allows access to portals big enough for a grown Yaru to fit through.

medium.name: Student of the Blade
medium.text: Your blade’s damage die increases by 1 step and it gains the Defensive tag.
